Value.description:
Auto increments the version and build number of your application every time a change has been made and stores it in version.h with easy to use variable declarations. Also have a feature for committing changes a la SVN style, a version scheme editor and a change log generator.
Example:
#include "version.h" string version = AutoVersion::FULLVERSION_STRING;
Declarations available in the AutoVersion namespace:
1) Date Version Types static char DATE[] static char MONTH[] static char YEAR[] static double UBUNTU_VERSION_STYLE
2) Software Status static char STATUS[] static char STATUS_SHORT[]
3) Standard Version Type static long MAJOR static long MINOR static long BUILD static long REVISION
4) Miscellaneous Version Types static long BUILDS_COUNT #define RC_FILEVERSION #define RC_FILEVERSION_STRING static char FULLVERSION_STRING[]
5) SVN Version static char SVN_REVISION[] static char SVN_DATE[]
